pages.text: Next Step! Did you have the Coal Coke ? If you haven't go to the coke oven and cook some coal into coal coke. You can cook a whole block of coal but the recipe of Block Of Coal was disabled. If you have it already, It's time to bring out our next multiblock structure - the Blast Furnace!
Like Coke Oven, you also need 27 blast bricks to build it

pages.name: Blast Furnace
pages.text: This oven will produce steel using coal coke and iron, YOU WILL NEED TONS OF STEELS.... and time too~~
After you finish, right click the Engineer's Hammer into the center block of the face you want to be the face of the furnace
